text: Whitechapel is an American deathcore band formed in 2006. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * The Somatic Defilement (2007) * This is Exile (2008) * A New Era of Corruption (2010) * Whitechapel (2012) * Our Endless War (2014) * Mark of the Blade (2016) * The Valley (2019) * Kin (2021) * Hymns in Dissonance (2025) ==References== Category:Deathcore bands Category:Death metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 2006
title: Whitechapel (band)
